comments_since_last_sample.body:
Good old instruction books and strategy guides!

When I was a kid I pretended I played FF1 on NES using the Nintendo Power strategy guide until Christmas.

I only played Dragon Warrior so I would write down how much HP I jad as I traced my finger on the map.

I would write down my G and use that to buy stuff in the strategy guide making up stories based on screenshots in the guide.

Then maybe a year later a friend at school told me about this thing called.. Dungeons and treasure?  Dragons and treasure?   I didnt know more then, he got hit by a car and died so I didnt know about that game until the Internet appeared.  :(
very nostalgic perfect to dust of and play silent hill 2 again
Oooh, now I'm getting flashbacks to my Uncharted game manual. I think they did this all the way up to PS3 right?
Scary how theyre gone… isnt it.
The manuals I loved were the ones where it would have a upcoming game advertisement.
I remember being stuck in a closet whilst Pyramid Head did….things.
I loved my Silent Hill game boxes and manuals... !
